mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_act_backup_recovery_log ( org_seq, uuid, hostname, datetime, status, result, ins_date ) VALUES( #{org_seq}, #{uuid}, #{hostname}, #{datetime}, #{action_status}, #{result}, now() )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_act_backup_recovery_log where uuid = #{uuid} order by ins_date desc limit 1

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM tbl_recovery_agent_job TA JOIN ( SELECT seq, org_seq, br_seq, status, ins_date, pc_seq FROM public.tbl_recovery_log WHERE org_seq = #{org_seq} AND pc_seq = ( select seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{pc_uuid} ) ORDER BY ins_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) TB on TA.recv_applc_seq = TB.seq

select count(*) as cnt from tbl_recovery_applc TA left outer join tbl_recovery_applc_history TB on TA.seq = TB.recv_applc_seq where TA.org_seq = #{org_seq} and TA.seq = ( select seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{pc_uuid} )
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_recovery_agent_job ( recv_applc_seq, org_seq, pc_seq, br_seq, status, insert_dt, br_backup_gubun, br_backup_path, br_backup_name, pc_uuid ) SELECT TA.seq, TA.org_seq, TA.pc_seq , TA.br_seq, TA.status, TA.ins_date, TB.br_backup_gubun, TB.br_backup_path, TB.br_backup_name, #{pc_uuid} as uuid
FROM public.tbl_recovery_log TA LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_backup_recovery_mngr TB ON TA.br_seq = TB.br_seq WHERE TA.org_seq = #{org_seq} AND TA.pc_seq = ( select seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{pc_uuid} ) ORDER BY TA.ins_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT (select pcm_name from tbl_policy_progrm_block_list where pcm_seq::char = arr[i]) as progrm_nm FROM ( SELECT generate_series(1, array_upper(arr, 1)) AS i, arr FROM ( SELECT regexp_split_to_array(#{arrPpmSeq}, ',') arr ) t ) t
